title: Bloody Gloves (1949 Sport) Punch-packed Action & Tender Romance

sources.title: Bloody Gloves (1949 Sport) Punch-packed Action & Tender Romance
sources.description:
Boxer Joe O'Hara takes a brutal hit in the ring, losing his sight to champ Tiger Johnson's dirty tricks. Now, piano prodigy Mike O'Hara trades his tux for gloves, stepping into the ring to settle the score!

Directed by Frank McDonald

Main cast:
Don 'Red' Barry - Mike O'Hara / King Cobra 
Tom Brown - Joe O'Hara
Sheila Ryan - Janet 'J.L.' Brannigan
Margia Dean - Joy White
Joey Adams - Duke Hensel
John Cason - Tiger Johnson
Joseph Crehan - Oscar Brannigan
Lyle Talbot - Radio Announcer
William Edmunds - Prof. Berger
Harry Brown - Fight Manager
Chester Clute - Timid Man
Michael Vallon - Battor
Edit Angold - Mama Berger


Black & White version: https://youtu.be/iaBeUOEMKF4
